title-group.article-title: VARIANT OF A THEOREM OF ERD≈êS ON THE SUM-OF-PROPER-DIVISORS FUNCTION

abstract.p: In 1973, Erd≈ës proved that a positive proportion of numbers are not of the form œÉ(n) ‚Äì n, the sum of the proper divisors of n. We prove the analogous result where œÉ is replaced with the sum-of-unitary-divisors function œÉ* (which sums divisors d of n such that (d, n/d) = 1), thus solving a problem of te Riele from 1976. We also describe a fast algorithm for enumerating numbers not in the form œÉ(n) ‚Äì n, œÉ*(n) ‚Äì n, and n ‚Äì ùúë(n), where ùúë is Euler's function.
